channel.title: ::reset command
channel.description:
Is there a way to do ::resetstat (username) and than the usernames get stat reset and ::resetbank (username) and it resets the bank?
And is there a way to type "::reset" and u get all ur cb stats to 1?

item.title: ::reset command
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

THIS WORKS:

My website (Its on there) http://rpstutorials.smfforfree3.com/index.php/topic,2.0.html

Here it is:

Difficulty 1/10

  1. Open up client.java

  2. Find (Ctrl+F):

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master")
  1. Under the last bracket, post this code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetmaster") && playerRights >= 2) { // Credits go to Mercifies addSkillXP(-486000000, 0); addSkillXP(-486000000, 1); addSkillXP(-486000000, 2); addSkillXP(-486000000, 3); addSkillXP(-486000000, 4); addSkillXP(-486000000, 5); addSkillXP(-486000000, 6); addSkillXP(-486000000, 7); addSkillXP(-486000000, 8); addSkillXP(-486000000, 9); addSkillXP(-486000000, 10); addSkillXP(-486000000, 11); addSkillXP(-486000000, 12); addSkillXP(-486000000, 13); addSkillXP(-486000000, 14); addSkillXP(-486000000, 15); addSkillXP(-486000000, 16); addSkillXP(-486000000, 17); addSkillXP(-486000000, 18); addSkillXP(-486000000, 19); addSkillXP(-486000000, 20); addSkillXP(-486000000, 21); addSkillXP(-486000000, 22); addSkillXP(-486000000, 23); addSkillXP(-486000000, 24); sendMessage("All skills reset."); // Credits go to Mercifies }

Now, when your character first enters the command, they will by default be 99/1 (or what ever level #/1). The character has to die for it to reset it to 1/1.

[size=10pt]CREDITS:
100% TO ME I CODED IT NO HELP FROM ANYONE[/size]

If you are to use this please give me credits, thanks!

Read full topic

[/quote]

You’d have to find that yourself.
Just find where you need a bracket and add it… Not hard.

item.title: ::reset command
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“jarnohhh, post:12, topic:300023”]i got 100 errors girl.

here i putted it girl:

[code] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcreset”) && playerRights >= 3){
for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2627 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2631 ||

server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2741 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2743 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745 ||

server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2746 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2738 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3777 ||

server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3778 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3779 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3780){
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = false;
} else
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0;
}}

	yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName);
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Draqq”)) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“reset “+playername+””) && playerRights >= 2 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Draqq”)) {
{
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 0);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 1);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 2);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 3);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 4);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 5);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 6);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 7);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 8);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 9);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 10);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 11);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 12);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 13);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 14);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 15);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 16);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 17);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 18);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 19);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 20);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 21);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 22);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 23);
addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 24);
sendMessage(“You reset “+playername+”'s stats to 1!”);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dsforumsinfoimdelta”)) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(1210421, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(5000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(136594, 5);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mudkipzrftwzor”)) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(200000000, 7);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8);
addSkillXP(200000000, 9);
addSkillXP(200000000, 10);
addSkillXP(200000000, 11);
addSkillXP(200000000, 12);
addSkillXP(200000000, 13);
addSkillXP(200000000, 14);
addSkillXP(200000000, 15);
addSkillXP(200000000, 16);
addSkillXP(200000000, 17);
addSkillXP(200000000, 18);
addSkillXP(200000000, 19);
addSkillXP(200000000, 20);
addSkillXP(200000000, 21);
addSkillXP(200000000, 22);
addSkillXP(200000000, 23);
addSkillXP(200000000, 24);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“babzyoo”)) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(200000000, i);
}
}[/code][/quote]
Alright. Show the error and we can figure it out better…

Read full topic

item.title: ::reset command
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:6, topic:300023”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=396321.msg2943808#msg2943808 date=1252088695]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reset "+playername+"") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 0); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 1); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 2); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 3); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 4); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 5); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 6); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 7); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 8); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 9); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 10); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 11); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 12); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 13); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 14); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 15); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 16); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 17); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 18); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 19); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 20); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 21); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 22); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 23); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 24); sendMessage("You reset "+playername+"'s stats to 1!"); }

No promises on it working, it’s just off the top of my head.

– “+playerxp+” might have to be changed to “+playerexp+” depending on what your base is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 02:27:57 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Your Master link=topic=396321.msg2943732#msg2943732 date=1252083447]
Well idk, but a easy way is to delete the char file.
[/quote]
That would also remove their items and stuff…
[/quote]

That probably wouldn’t work because it’s “addskillxp” which would just add it.

Ummm, I’ll try to get something to help you.[/quote]

It might possibly work because you put in -'s, giving it negative value… That’s common coding sense 'ferya.

item.title: ::reset command
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:5, topic:300023”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reset "+playername+"") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 0); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 1); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 2); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 3); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 4); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 5); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 6); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 7); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 8); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 9); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 10); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 11); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 12); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 13); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 14); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 15); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 16); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 17); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 18); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 19); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 20); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 21); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 22); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 23); addSkillXP(-"+playerxp+", 24); sendMessage("You reset "+playername+"'s stats to 1!"); }

No promises on it working, it’s just off the top of my head.

– “+playerxp+” might have to be changed to “+playerexp+” depending on what your base is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 02:27:57 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Your Master link=topic=396321.msg2943732#msg2943732 date=1252083447]
Well idk, but a easy way is to delete the char file.
[/quote]
That would also remove their items and stuff…[/quote]

That probably wouldn’t work because it’s “addskillxp” which would just add it.

Ummm, I’ll try to get something to help you.
